name: BUGS BUG OFF!
description:
You are a hungry bird who wants to eat all of the bugs in the garden. Sit back and enjoy the ambient backtrack while you click away at the bugs ravaging the garden.

Controls

1 Button. Right Mouse. Click to thrust forward and click on the highlighted bugs to "EAT" them. 

There will also be coin bombs in the air that give you 20 coins. Collect them for some more monnney! At the end of the round, you can buy upgrades such as: 

- Bug Value which controls the amount of money each bug gives

- Coin bomb chance which will increase the chance of coin bombs

- Bug Spawn Frequency which will increase the Frequency of the bug spawn

Cheeky Self Promo

I am going to be posting a little devlog about this project on my youtube channel (Youtube.com/Flaroon). Subscribe and turn on bell notifs for that!

HAVE FUN!!
